description: This file defines a React functional component named 'Layout' that provides a page layout with a sidebar navigation, top bar, and main content area. It manages user state and handles logout functionality.

methods.name: Layout({ children, title, subtitle })
methods.description: React functional component that renders the application's layout with sidebar and topbar, handling user info display and logout functionality.

methods.name: handleLogout
methods.description: Handles user logout by calling signOut() and navigating to the login page.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Layout({ children, title, subtitle }) {$/
